(()=>{function f({getGlobal:o,setGlobal:c,translateArguments:l,syncItemsCallback:n,usesKeyboardCallback:u}){let a={},d=o();c(function(...r){let p=l({originalArguments:r,accessibilityEventParameters:a});d.apply(window,p)});try{i({mediaFeature:"prefers-reduced-motion",possibleValues:["no-preference","reduce"]}),i({mediaFeature:"prefers-color-scheme",possibleValues:["light","dark"]}),i({mediaFeature:"inverted-colors",possibleValues:["none","inverted"]}),i({mediaFeature:"forced-colors",possibleValues:["none","active"]}),i({mediaFeature:"prefers-contrast",possibleValues:["no-preference","more","less","custom"]}),n&&n()}catch(e){console.error(e)}(function(){try{let r=setInterval(function(){let t=document.querySelector(":focus-visible");if(!t)return;let s=t.tagName.toUpperCase();s==="INPUT"||s==="TEXTAREA"||t.contentEditable!=="true"&&(a["uses-keyboard"]=!0,clearInterval(r),u&&u())},500)}catch(r){console.error(r)}})();function i({mediaFeature:e,possibleValues:r}){b({mediaFeature:e,possibleValues:r})}function b({mediaFeature:e,possibleValues:r}){if(m({mediaFeature:e})===!1)return;let t=r.map(s=>({possibleValue:s,mediaQueryResult:window.matchMedia(\`(\${e}: \${s})\`).matches})).find(({_:s,mediaQueryResult:y})=>y===!0);if(t===void 0){console.error(\`Something went wrong. Is there a new \${e} allowed value not accounted for here?\`);return}a[e]=t.possibleValue}function m({mediaFeature:e}){return window.matchMedia(\`not all and (\${e}), (\${e})\`).matches?!0:(console.warn(\`Your browser doesn't support \${e} yet\`),!1)}}function h(){f({getGlobal:()=>window.plausible,setGlobal:o=>{window.plausible=o},translateArguments:({originalArguments:o,accessibilityEventParameters:c})=>{let l=[...o];if(o.length>=2){let n=o[1],a={...n?.props,...c},d={...n,props:a};l[1]=d}return l},syncItemsCallback:globalThis.a11y_analytics_config?.plausible?.callbacks?.onSyncItemsResolved,usesKeyboardCallback:globalThis.a11y_analytics_config?.plausible?.callbacks?.onUsesKeyboardResolved})}h();})();
